abstract.p: This paper sketches research in nine areas related to spoken language translation: interactive disambiguation (two demonstrations of highly interactive, broad-coverage speech translation are reported); system architecture; data structures; the interface between speech recognition and analysis; the use of natural pauses for segmenting utterances; example-based machine translation; dialogue acts; the tracking of lexical co-occurrences; and the resolution of translation mismatches.
